channel.title: System Update, Simple
channel.description: I'm helping out my friend by taking care of his server but I want to make an update, I already compile.bat and I just don't want to close the run.bat and disconnect players without telling them what's going on. How can I make the "System Update 1:03" come out in bottom right corner of the game screen? Thanks.

item.title: System Update, Simple
item.dc:creator: @Imaginary Imaginary
item.description:
@Imaginary wrote:

I’m helping out my friend by taking care of his server but I want to make an update, I already compile.bat and I just don’t want to close the run.bat and disconnect players without telling them what’s going on.
How can I make the “System Update 1:03” come out in bottom right corner of the game screen?
Thanks.
